page.title: 01INTRODUCTION
page.content: Our area of Sutterton and its environs is of a Rural aspect with a considerable farming element.It is situated around the A16 to Spalding and the A17 to King's Lynn.Therefore the roads are very busy with heavy goods transport going to the ports.Originally the village was linear the houses being along the two main roads with the large estate in the centre going through to Algarkirk and belonging to the Beridge family(there is still a family trust to help children going on to further education).This estate has now gone but one of the two round gate houses still stands leading to the Park Avenue housing estate where the school stands.We were much surprised to find there were 79 old people's bungalows and only 37 semi-detached houses for families.
